createBoardTimer(Runnable) - Method in class Models.MineSweeperBoard
This creates a new executor to increase the timer on the board We create a scheduled executor to decrease computing time of using a while true loop
createBombs(int, int) - Method in class Models.MineSweeperBoard
This method places bombs in random locations once the user clicks on the board for the first time.
createController(File) - Method in class View.MineSweeper
Creates a controller from a loaded file, which entails updating the board after setting up the display.
createController(String) - Method in class View.MineSweeper
Creates a new controller with the chosen difficulty, then sets up the display with it.
createDisplayFromController() - Method in class View.MineSweeper
Uses the information in the controller (namely the size of the board) to create an initial grid of hexagons of that size.
createPauseButton() - Method in class View.MineSweeper
Creates the actual pause button to be displayed in the scene
createScene() - Method in class View.MineSweeper
Sets up the basic structure of the game screen, including the buttons, timer, and their relative locations in the panes.
createScoreBoard(MineSweeperController, HBox) - Method in class View.MineSweeper
Creates a scoreboard from the top times for the current difficulty.
